title: Orchestral Action Music Pack
description: Orchestral Action Music Pack is an album with 5 cinematic action tracks featuring realistic orchestra, cinematic percussions, choir and electronic synths with Hollywood quality.
longDescription:
Orchestral Action Music PackÂ is an album with 5 cinematic action tracks featuring realistic orchestra, cinematic percussions, choir and electronic synths with Hollywood quality. It contains powerful staccato motives and really catchy and emotive melodies that will remain in your mind for a long time. You can find intense and dramatic parts and suspenseful and sneaky parts, perfect for any kind of situation. It is suitable for battle, chase, boss, fight and action scenes for your game or media production.


The pack contains full versions, 2 alternate versions and many looped versions that will help you to embed easily the music in your project.


You can preview the full versions here: https://soundcloud.com/ficus-prosound/sets/epic-orchestral-action-music-pack


For any question, request or custom music you can contact me at: hello@jordilongan.com


Track list:


1.Ancient Battle Full Version (3:08) (+2 versions and 4 loops)


2.Armageddon Full Version (1:48) +2 versions and 5 loops)


3.Desert Maneuvers Full Version (1:53) (+2 versions and 4 loops)


4.Fighting The Boss Full Version (1:41) (+2 versions and 7 loops)


5.Tactical Combat Operations Full Version (1:38) (+2 versions and 7 loops)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • High quality original music
  • Many looped versions and short versions with endings
  • Responsive support

Number of Audio Wavs: 42

Number of Audio Cues: 42

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 38:00

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
